title: Siam Cement Approves Plan to List SCG Packaging in Thailand
text:
By P.R.Venkat

Siam Cement PCL (SCC.TH) said Monday that its board has approved a proposal to list its package business in Thailand.

Up to 30% of SCG Packaging's shares will be offered in the initial public offering and Siam Cement will remain the controlling shareholder with at least a 70% stake.

The size and timing of the offering weren't disclosed.

SCG Packaging will use the proceeds from the planned IPO for domestic and international business expansion, Siam Cement said.
